blocks.name: suppdm
blocks.content: If the range of a function does not contain the zero, the support of the function equals its domain. (Contributed by AV, 20-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppdm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wnel(c2, crn(c0))), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c2), cdm(c0)))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c0, csupp, c2), cdm(c0), crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wnel(c2, crn(c0))))
  adantr(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wnel(c2, crn(c0)), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c2), crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  suppval1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wnel(c2, crn(c0))), wceq(cdm(c0), crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))), wral(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cdm(c0), wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wnel(c2, crn(c0))), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))
  impancom(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wnel(c2, crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))
  syl5bi(wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wnel(c2, crn(c0)), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wn(wcel(c2, crn(c0))))
  df-nel(c2, crn(c0))
  necon3bd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wcel(c2, crn(c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(c2, crn(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), crn(c0)))
  3ad2antl1(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), crn(c0)))
  fvelrn(c0, cv(hs0))
  eqcoms(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2, wb(wcel(c2, crn(c0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), crn(c0))))
  eleq1(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), crn(c0))
  rabid2(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wnel(c2, crn(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
}

blocks.name: divge1b
blocks.content: The ratio of a real number to a positive real number is greater than or equal to 1 iff the divisor (the positive real number) is less than or equal to the dividend (the real number). (Contributed by AV, 26-May-2020.)

  breq1d(c0, cle, c1, co(nat1, cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(c0, co(nat1, cmul, c0)))
  eqcomd(c0, co(nat1, cmul, c0), wcel(c0, crp))
  mulid2d(c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  rpcn(c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(co(nat1, cmul, c0), cle, c1), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c1, cdiv, c0))), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))

  impcom(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(co(c1, cmin, nat1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  adantr(wbr(co(c1, cmin, nat1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  biimprcd(wbr(co(c1, cmin, nat1), clt, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, nat1), clt, c0)))
  zlem1lt(c1, c0)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(co(c1, cmin, nat1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c0)
  zre(c1)
  letri3(c0, c1)
}

thm flsubz(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(cfl, c0), cmin, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cmin, c1)), co(cfv(cfl, c0), cmin, c1), cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1))), co(cfv(cfl, c0), caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz)))
  fveq2d(cfl, co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz)))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)

  sylan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1))), co(cfv(cfl, c0), caddc, cneg(c1))), wcel(cneg(c1), cz))
  znegcl(c1)
  fladdz(c0, cneg(c1))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(cfv(cfl, c0), caddc, cneg(c1)), co(cfv(cfl, c0), cmin, c1)), wcel(cfv(cfl, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))

thm flsubz(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚Üí(‚åä `(c0[-]c1))=((‚åä ` c0)[-]c1))
} = {
  3eqtrd((‚åä `(c0[-]c1)), ((‚åä ` c0)[-]c1), (‚åä `(c0[+]-u(c1))), ((‚åä ` c0)[+]-u(c1)), (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§))
  fveq2d(cfl, (c0[-]c1), (c0[+]-u(c1)), (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§))
  eqcomd((c0[-]c1), (c0[+]-u(c1)), (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (c0[+]-u(c1))=(c0[-]c1), c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  recn(c0)
  negsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (‚åä `(c0[+]-u(c1)))=((‚åä ` c0)[+]-u(c1)), -u(c1)‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  znegcl(c1)
  fladdz(c0, -u(c1))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, ((‚åä ` c0)[+]-u(c1))=((‚åä ` c0)[-]c1), (‚åä ` c0)‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  recnd((‚åä ` c0), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  reflcl(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  negsub((‚åä ` c0), c1)
}
